Sachiko."},{"lineNumber":15662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………みたいな気に、たまになるねん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Sometimes I get that kind of feeling."},{"lineNumber":15663,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全部ポルトガルジョークやけどな」","translatedEnglishLine":"They're all Portuguese jokes, though.\""},{"lineNumber":15664,"originalJapaneseLine":"人格が変わったように静かになって、","translatedEnglishLine":"He became quiet as if his personality serious...\""},{"lineNumber":15667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……人類のため、仲間のため……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...For humanity, for my comrades..."},{"lineNumber":15668,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全力で戦います」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will fight with all my strength.\""},{"lineNumber":15669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance!"},{"lineNumber":15670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスでしょ、私のスパナ隠したの","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, you’re the one who hid my wrench, right?"},{"lineNumber":15671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さーてどうかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I wonder about that."},{"lineNumber":15672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前が機械いじりばっかりしてるから","translatedEnglishLine":"It's because you’re always messing with machines,"},{"lineNumber":15673,"originalJapaneseLine":"　天罰が下ったんじゃないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"and I guess divine punishment came down on you?\""},{"lineNumber":15674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昨日まではあったのよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was there until yesterday."},{"lineNumber":15675,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昨夜追い返したからって、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just because I sent you away last night,"},{"lineNumber":15676,"originalJapaneseLine":"　根に持ってるんでしょ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"you’re holding a grudge, aren’t you!\""},{"lineNumber":15677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、知らん知らん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, I don’t know, I don’t know!\""},{"lineNumber":15678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、子供みたいな事……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, such childish matters..."},{"lineNumber":15679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　細かい調整するからアレじゃないとダメなの。","translatedEnglishLine":"I have to use that because it’s the only one that works for fine adjustments."},{"lineNumber":15680,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっさと返してよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just hurry up and return it.\""},{"lineNumber":15681,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……ごめんなさい、マリアさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um...sorry, Maria."},{"lineNumber":15682,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今はランス様の部屋に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"She’s currently in Lord Lance’s room...\""},{"lineNumber":15683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょーーーーーーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Noooooooo!\""},{"lineNumber":15684,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃああぁっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":15685,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがシィルの脳天にランスちょーっぷ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance taps the top of Shiil’s head."},{"lineNumber":15686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんて奴隷だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What a slave!"},{"lineNumber":15687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前、マリアの部屋に忍び込んで","translatedEnglishLine":"You sneaked into Maria's room"},{"lineNumber":15688,"originalJapaneseLine":"　物を盗んだのか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and stole something!\""},{"lineNumber":15689,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひんひん……そ、それはランス様が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whimper... Th-That’s because Lord Lance...\""},{"lineNumber":15690,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょーーーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nooooooo!\""},{"lineNumber":15691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひううぅぅっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyuuaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":15692,"originalJapaneseLine":"「止めなさいよ、もう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stop it already..."},{"lineNumber":15693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうせランスが盗ませたんでしょ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance made you steal it, didn’t he?\""},{"lineNumber":15694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは。そういうわけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahahahaha. That being so,"},{"lineNumber":15695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の部屋によく似たスパナがあるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I have a wrench very similar to it in my room."},{"lineNumber":15696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　取りに来るか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come and get it.\""},{"lineNumber":15697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあもうまったく、小細工を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, honestly, such petty tricks...\""},{"lineNumber":15698,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".....................\""},{"lineNumber":15699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ラン……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Ran...\""},{"lineNumber":15700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんにちは、ランさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hello, Ran-san.\""},{"lineNumber":15701,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう、ランちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Ran-chan."},{"lineNumber":15702,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君も来るか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You coming too?\""},{"lineNumber":15703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こんにちは、総統閣下」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hello, Supreme Commander.\""},{"lineNumber":15704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh...\""},{"lineNumber":15705,"originalJapaneseLine":"声の冷たさに、思わずランスが鼻白む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance involuntarily paled at the coldness in the voice."},{"lineNumber":15706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみませんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Excuse me, but,"},{"lineNumber":15707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少しマリアをお借りしていいですか。","translatedEnglishLine":"may I borrow Maria for a bit?"},{"lineNumber":15708,"originalJapaneseLine":"　チューリップ部隊のことで、打ち合わせが」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have a meeting about the Tulip Unit.\""},{"lineNumber":15709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まあいいが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well, that's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":15710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとうございます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you very much."},{"lineNumber":15711,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マリア、いい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria, is that okay?\""},{"lineNumber":15712,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":15713,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアを促して、ランは去ってゆく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Encouraging Maria, Ran left."},{"lineNumber":15714,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それから。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...And also."},{"lineNumber":15715,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他人の物を盗んだら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you steal someone else's property,"},{"lineNumber":15716,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分できちんと返しておくべきだと思うわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think you should properly return it yourself.\""},{"lineNumber":15717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":15718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then.\""},{"lineNumber":15719,"originalJapaneseLine":"今度こそ、ランは歩き去っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"This time for sure, Ran walked away."},{"lineNumber":15720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はあ。ピリッとしてますね、ランさん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hah. Ran-san sure is sharp...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンはサチコから離れる。
「…………みたいな気に、たまになるねん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Sometimes I get that kind of feeling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全部ポルトガルジョークやけどな」
人格が変わったように静かになって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He became quiet as if his personality changed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンはお風呂に入っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Copandon went to take a bath.
I will fight with all my strength."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスでしょ、私のスパナ隠したの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, you’re the one who hid my wrench, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が機械いじりばっかりしてるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's because you’re always messing with machines,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天罰が下ったんじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I guess divine punishment came down on you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨夜追い返したからって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just because I sent you away last night,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根に持ってるんでしょ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you’re holding a grudge, aren’t you!"
"Hahaha, I don’t know, I don’t know!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かい調整するからアレじゃないとダメなの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to use that because it’s the only one that works for fine adjustments.
Just hurry up and return it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……ごめんなさい、マリアさん。
今はランス様の部屋に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s currently in Lord Lance’s room..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーーーーーーーーーッ！」
ランスがシィルの脳天にランスちょーっぷ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance taps the top of Shiil’s head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、マリアの部屋に忍び込んで
「ひんひん……そ、それはランス様が……」
どうせランスが盗ませたんでしょ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance made you steal it, didn’t he?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは。そういうわけで、
俺の部屋によく似たスパナがあるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a wrench very similar to it in my room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあもうまったく、小細工を……」
声の冷たさに、思わずランスが鼻白む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance involuntarily paled at the coldness in the voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しマリアをお借りしていいですか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: may I borrow Maria for a bit?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ部隊のことで、打ち合わせが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have a meeting about the Tulip Unit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアを促して、ランは去ってゆく。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you steal someone else's property,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分できちんと返しておくべきだと思うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think you should properly return it yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度こそ、ランは歩き去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time for sure, Ran walked away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はあ。ピリッとしてますね、ランさん……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
